name: @opengovsg/ts-template
description: A template for most TypeScript projects in OGP

scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev-start: env-cmd concurrently "npm run on-backend -- dev" "npm run on-frontend -- start"
scripts.lint: npm run on-backend -- lint && npm run on-frontend -- lint
scripts.lint-fix: npm run on-backend -- lint-fix && npm run on-frontend -- lint-fix
scripts.test: npm run on-backend -- test && npm run on-frontend -- test

author: Open Government Products, GovTech Singapore (https://open.gov.sg)

hooks.pre-commit: npm run on-backend -- lint-staged && npm run on-frontend -- lint-staged
